t 
for having a different opinion of  people's results, I think you will 
u=
nderstand why I will not  post my name and address here.

Try anyway though=
.   I don't know how your personal beliefs here work, but 
others  seem to =
get messages about people they've never heard of, or  places 
they've never=
 seen.

I would also suggest anyone  who tries this experiment, to post you=
r 
results on the list  here rather than sending them personally to me - so=

be  accused of losing any.

h you, I will not ask them to run around the world a

raste=
rer@yahoo. com writes:

 

I have placed a little something on top of my  c=
omputer monitor, right in 
front of me. It is now  7/10/2010. I will leave =
it there 4 days, and remove 
it  Noon Denver time, on Wednesday, 7/14/2010.=


All you  have to do is ask your boxes/spirits/ aliens/etc, what it  is.

=
I have taken a picture of it, and posted it to  the files section here, so =

there is no way I can squirm  out of the results:

_http://tech. groups.ya=
hoo.  com/group/ EVP-ITC/files/ RJ/RJ.20100710.  
1.zip_ (http://tech.group=
s.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/RJ/RJ.20100710.1.zip) 

Please do not try t=
o open the file before  noon Wednesday. But feel free to 
download it to yo=
ur  computer beforehand, so you can be sure I won't change 
it  during, or =
after, the test.

Answers anyone reveals  after noon Wednesday don't count.=
 Partial answers 
(like  just the color, or shape, or some emotion vibe) do=
n't  count. Just 
tell me what it is.

Best of Luck. I  hope for this to be=
 a regularly occurring experiment, and  
I hope we all can learn from the r=
esults.
